content:
I'm slowly learning about IG authoring/publishing and am looking at these sites documentation:

  • http://build.fhir.org/implementationguide.html
  • http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=IG_Publisher_Documentation (updated 7 April 2018)
  • http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Implementation_Guide_Publishing_Requirements (update 4 February 2018)

I found these as well, but it looks like it's been a while since they've been updated. Are they still accurate?

  • http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Implementation_Guide (updated 19 May 2016)
  • http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=ImplementationGuide_Guidance (updated 7 Nov 2016)

Are there others I should be aware of?

There's also this: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_IG_Framework, which is mostly up-to-date and is relevant for how things are set up for Genomics. http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Implementation_Guide actually applies to v3 specs. The ImplementationGuide_Guidance one hasn't really been reviewed/discussed/approved, though there's some good stuff in there.
Looks like this page shouldn't exist anymore: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/FHIR+Implementation+Guide+Authoring
